meanings.sent2: She eats fruits and vegetables every day.
meanings.sent3: The hungry squirrel has eaten all the nuts in the garden.
meanings.sent4: Time had eaten away at the old wooden fence, leaving it weak and fragile.
meanings.sent5: The flames eagerly eaten up the dry leaves in the forest.

meanings.sent1: The cake was already eaten when I arrived.
meanings.sent2: The cookies were eaten by the children in no time.
meanings.sent3: The eaten sandwich looked like a work of modern art.
meanings.sent4: The eaten apple core lay forgotten on the picnic blanket.
meanings.sent5: The eaten pizza crusts were scattered around the table.
